Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory594.jpg'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Karenina? Hello? Karenina... Do you copy?'}
{3: "Teddy's voice spreads across the entire lunar base. Karenina can also hear her in the comms device."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Copy! You're too noisy... I'm busy right now.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab'}
{3: "Karenina dodges the white monster's fast leap strike and shoots at it. She uses the cannon's recoil to quickly move away, avoiding the follow-up claw attacks."}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Hey... What are you fighting against?'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'A monster... made from the zero-point engine and... um, white pieces of flesh?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'I must be an idiot to hope that you can explain things clearly with that extremely poor expression of yours...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab', 2: '2'}

{3: "The frenzied monster shatters the rocks on the ground, sending the gravel and lunar soil flying toward Karenina. Karenina has seen them coming, so she leaps high above and prepares to attack the monster's head—which happens to be the zero-point engine."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFallNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: "To her surprise, the monster suddenly emits gravitational waves, changing the rocks' projectile from horizontal to vertical."}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'What the?!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFallNew.prefab'}

{3: "Karenina fired her cannon in advance to shoot all the rocks down. If she didn't do so, even if she gets lucky and doesn't get injured, the kinetic energy from the rocks will still blow her away."}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Hello... Karenina?'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I'm fine... But...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Aerial attacks don't seem to work on this monster. To reach the zero-point engine on its head, she must limit its action by hitting its weak points."}
{3: 'But how can she limit the action of a monster that can repair itself infinitely...?'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Well, I better not think too much. If destroying it once isn't enough, I'll do it twice! Or even three times!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Hmph... Only you can think of such a stupid idea. But I guess it's the best strategy for you."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Karenina once again charges at the pale monster. She jumps above and slams her Blast Hammer down, knocking up lunar soil to block its vision.'}
{3: 'Still, the monster is intelligent enough to unleash wide-range gravitational waves that blow away the lunar soil instantly. Even if Karenina jumps up, she will be pulled down.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'But when it focuses on the sky, it completely ignores Karenina, who is rushing out from the dust.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{3: 'Screaming, running, Karenina throws herself toward the gravitational waves emitted by the monster and neutralizes part of them with the gravity control system of her own frame.'}
{3: "Karenina knew the wide-range waves wouldn't have as much strength, so she chose to break through from the front."}
{3: "The monster has no time to react. It can only watch Karenina's Blast Hammer approach as its engine makes a loud hum."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "I'll crush you!!", 4: '1'}
{3: "The instant thrust from the Blast Hammer's engine has sufficient speed to make any blunt weapon sharp like a blade."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 3: "The monster's right leg is immediately severed from its body and falls to the ground. Still, it manages to swing its claw to hold Karenina off."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "****! It's got good reflexes...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The gravitational waves keep Karenina at bay. She can only watch the monster recover.'}
{3: 'However, no matter how hard the monster trembles, its right leg does not seem to be growing back.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Wait... It can't regenerate fast like before...", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Yeah, we're also investigating this. It could be due to a change in the zero-point energy supply. Some of the energy is allocated to a strange place... It's going to the Omega Weapon where that agent is located."}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'What makes it more strange is that the Corrupted who kept attacking us suddenly weakened a lot...'}
{3: 'Karenina looks in the direction of the Construct lab as she mumbles to herself.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'So... She chose to live on in the end...', 4: '1'}
{3: "The pale mutant's right leg has slowly grown back, but instead of attacking back, it runs to the center of the battlefield in order to absorb more remotely transmitted zero-point energy."}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Karenina, the gravitational waves will reach the critical point in 12 minutes and 21 seconds! You must hurry...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'I must kill it before it finishes absorbing energy!', 4: '1'}
